Articles.Content:
On the latest build of KSP during the game I tried quicksaving (during an attempt to land on the Mun) which froze the game. After restarting it I cant open the Resume Saved menu, clicking it makes the game pause for a brief moment as if loading but then nothing and clicking it again doesnt even make it pause. I have the following mods installed: Chatterer, Chute Safety Indicator, Kerbal Engineer, MechJeb, Portrait Stats, Protractor, Trigger Tech.

I also had several Kopernicus expanded Kerbol system mods but I removed them when I tried trouble shooting it myself, I have just left Kerbin's SoI so it was no big loss. I also tried removing all the mods to see if that could be an issue. I also tried deleting the quicksave in the save folder, didnt work either.

Link to copy of persistent.sfs and link to quicksave.sfs.
